description: Retriever that uses a vector store and an LLM to generate the vector store queries.

query.info: Query to be passed as input.

vectorstore.info: Vector Store to be passed as input.

attribute_infos.info: Metadata Field Info to be passed as input.

document_content_description.info: Document Content Description to be passed as input.

llm.info: LLM to be passed as input.
